testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to add a new Refund&Reason record to the system via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a POST body containing invalid authorization information and necessary data (reason) is sent to the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/refundReasonAdd" path parameters...................passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing the "product mismatch" information to send to the api refundReasonAdd endpoint..passed * The api user sends the POST request and saves the response returned from the api refundReasonAdd endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 401.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "Unauthenticated.".passed
